Motivation

Data science and technology are constantly evolving and keeping up can be difficult. I set up this blog as a tool to share some of the things I‚Äôve learned with others and for my own posterity. R is my favorite data science language so most of my posts are written in R, but I also use Python, SQL, and others regularly so I try to share content regarding those as well.
